question:
Consider the following statements:
  1. Most of the Nuclear Power Reactors of India are Boiling Water Reactors
  2. Most Boiling Water Reactors are capable of withstanding high seismic stresses
Which among the above statements is / are correct?
explanation: Both the statements are incorrect. You can read about types of nuclear reactors here: https://www.gktoday.in/gk/types-of-nuclear-reactors/
